mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tr_gc_calendar ( `gc_date`, `gc_id`, `del_flg`, `created`, `created_user`, `modified`, `modified_user` ) VALUES( #{gcDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gcId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modified, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ;
